description:
Affordable modern hotel with large rooms and onsite spa

Comfort by the river
This well-priced hotel locates you on the south bank of the River Thames, about a 15- to 20-minute walk over the Chelsea Bridge to Sloane Square Tube Station. Guests report that it's a modern, clean, and surprisingly affordable hotel.

Open spaces
For a breath of fresh air, stroll among the lakes and landscaped lawns of Battersea Park. One of London's finest and grandest public green spaces, the park is just a few steps from Pestana Chelsea Bridge Hotel & Spa.

Health and beauty
If you want to unwind after a long day of shopping and sightseeing, there's a small but stylish spa in the basement with heated pool, steam room, and sauna. WiFi is on tap throughout the hotel, and is free in public areas. Terrace, outdoor tennis court, 24-hour fitness facility, and 6 meeting rooms are also available.

Big rooms, great value
Guestrooms are larger than the London average – more like a normal American hotel room. And guests also appreciate that the bathrooms are big enough to feature a separate tub and shower. Room service runs 24-7. All guestrooms and public areas of the hotel are smoke-free, and service dogs are allowed. Free WiFi and wired Internet access are also available.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Affordable modern hotel with large rooms and onsite spa

Comfort by the river
This well-priced hotel locates you on the south bank of the River Thames, about a 15- to 20-minute walk over the Chelsea Bridge to Sloane Square Tube Station. Guests report that it's a modern, clean, and surprisingly affordable hotel.

Open spaces
For a breath of fresh air, stroll among the lakes and landscaped lawns of Battersea Park. One of London's finest and grandest public green spaces, the park is just a few steps from Pestana Chelsea Bridge Hotel & Spa.

Health and beauty
If you want to unwind after a long day of shopping and sightseeing, there's a small but stylish spa in the basement with heated pool, steam room, and sauna. WiFi is on tap throughout the hotel, and is free in public areas. Terrace, outdoor tennis court, 24-hour fitness facility, and 6 meeting rooms are also available.

Big rooms, great value
Guestrooms are larger than the London average – more like a normal American hotel room. And guests also appreciate that the bathrooms are big enough to feature a separate tub and shower. Room service runs 24-7. All guestrooms and public areas of the hotel are smoke-free, and service dogs are allowed. Free WiFi and wired Internet access are also available.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
In addition to a full-service spa, Pestana Chelsea Bridge Hotel & Spa features an outdoor tennis court and an indoor pool. Dining options at the hotel include a restaurant, a coffee shop/café, and a snack bar/deli. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Public areas are equipped with complimentary high-speed wired and wireless Internet access.

This 4-star property offers access to a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and meeting rooms. 6 meeting rooms are available. This business-friendly hotel also offers a health club, a sauna, and spa services. Parking is available onsite for a surcharge.

Pestana Chelsea Bridge Hotel & Spa is a smoke-free property.

DINING.value:
English breakfasts are available for a surcharge and are served each morning between 6:30 AM and 11 AM.
Atlantico Restaurant - This restaurant serves breakfast, brunch, lunch, and dinner. Guests can enjoy alfresco dining (weather permitting).
24-hour room service is available.

RECREATION.value:
An outdoor tennis court and a health club are featured at the hotel. In addition to an indoor pool, other recreational amenities include a sauna and a 24-hour fitness center.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same hotel / stay dates).

NEARBY_POINTS_OF_INTEREST.value:
Battersea Park - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Saatchi Gallery - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Sloane Square - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Victoria Palace Theatre - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Tate Britain - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Victoria and Albert Museum - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Kennington Oval - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Harrods - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
St. James Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Buckingham Palace - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
London Natural History Museum - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Houses of Parliament - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Westminster Abbey - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Parliament Square - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Big Ben - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi

The closest major airports to Pestana Chelsea Bridge Hotel & Spa are:
London (LCY-London City) - 14 km / 8.7 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 20.8 km / 13 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 36.2 km / 22.5 mi
London (LTN-Luton) - 46.9 km / 29.1 mi

The preferred airport for Pestana Chelsea Bridge Hotel & Spa is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

HCOM_SPA.value: Guests can indulge in a pampering treatment at the hotel's full-service spa, Tres Spa. Services include deep-tissue massages, massages, facials, and body wraps. The spa is equipped with a sauna and a steam room. A variety of treatment therapies are provided, including Ayurvedic.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Located in Chelsea, this spa hotel is within 2 mi (3 km) of Battersea Park, Harrods, and Buckingham Palace. Sloane Square and Saatchi Gallery are also within 1 mi (2 km).

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value:
• This property offers transfers from the train station (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation.
  • Children 12 years old and younger stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding.
  • The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

  • Self parking fee: GBP 23 per night
  • Rollaway bed fee: GBP 30 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

GOLD.value: Guests are consistently blown away by Pestana Chelsea Bridge Hotel & Spa's large guestrooms, especially given the overall value of the hotel and its modern design and amenities. Beautiful Battersea Park is right out the front door.

GUESTS_LOVE.value:
Guests Love
  • Good value

  • Large guestrooms and bathrooms

  • Heated indoor pool

  • Close to Battersea Park

    • Keep in Mind
  • Nearest Tube is a 15-minute walk

  • WiFi is free

END_OF_THE_DAY.value:
At the end of the day…
Our guests love the big rooms at Pestana Chelsea Bridge Hotel & Spa. Some advise requesting one at the front of the hotel, for distance from the railroad tracks. It's a healthy walk to and from the Tube, but a pretty one.

ROOM_FEATURE.value: Pestana Chelsea Bridge Hotel & Spa puts you just a 5-minute drive from Battersea Park and Saatchi Gallery. You can visit the spa to indulge in deep-tissue massages, detox wraps, or Ayurvedic treatments, and Atlantico Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. There's an indoor pool and a bar/lounge, and rooms at this upscale hotel get the details right with iPod docks and premium bedding.

  • Harrods (1.6 mi / 2.5 km)
  • Buckingham Palace (1.6 mi / 2.6 km)
  • Sloane Square (0.9 mi / 1.5 km)
  • Saatchi Gallery (1 mi / 1.6 km)

POLICIES.value: This property requires full payment at check-in for any bookings where payment for the stay will be made on site instead of at the time of booking. Incidentals or additional fees are due at check-out. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.
